title: Lotus Lounge
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A cafe/juice bar located in the back of a wellness space. Has vegan and raw choices such as sandwiches, salads, side dishes, made-in-house soups, made-in-house chips, raw juices, smoothies organic and/or fair trade teas and coffees, raw and baked sweet and savory bakery items. Has an open space and brick walls and is right off of Historical 25th St in downtown.
